name: Tribal Skull Sailor Stripe Legging
description:
StudZnBabydollZ Original Design .. Tribal Skull Collection

For the little and fashionable these hip little modern studznbabydollz leggings are a perfect addition to your unique child's wardrobe. The tribal skull is on the back over your little ones BOMBOM, Babies live in leggings! They are a must for every season, from play time to outings and nap time.Perfect bottoms that go with so many tops or dresses for your little one.Leggings keep their little legs warm but not over heated. 

Made from light weight cotton knit jersey perfect for all weather.Quality handmade leggings serged seams for durability! Finished off with a high quality elastic waistband and can be rolled up or down for extra length as your little one grows giving you extra length...

Available Sizes Ready to Ship!!!

Follow us on Instagram..STUDZNBABYDOLLZ for special offers !You can add an adorable pair of leather moccasins to complete your little ones new outfit...

name: Native Weathered Honey Bear
description:
All of our moccasins are made of genuine soft leather handcrafted and designed to fit snug around your little ones feet they all have elastic around the ankle for a comfortable fit and to assure they don't come off there kicking and crawling little feet . All our Moccasins are easy to put on and easy to take off they are great for Newbies, crawlers and also great on toddlers 
All moccasins are made with a soft sole.

Moccasin sizing info:

Studz n Babydollz moccasins fit true to size for the most accurate fit measure your child's foot from the heel to the tip of the big toe and add 1/4-1/2" for wiggle room. The following chart is just an ESTIMATE of how these moccasins compare to shoe sizes all feet are different the size chart is a general guideline..

READY TO SHIP 5.5"

MADE TO ORDER SIZES:
4"      finished sole (approximate US size 1 )    0-3 mos.
4.5”   finished sole (approximate US size 2 )    3-6 mos.
5”      finished sole (approximate US size 3/4)  6-12mos.
5.5”   finished sole (approximate US size 5/6)  12-18 mos. 

(Size 5.5" and larger will have a thicker suede sole can be worn outside for toddlers but they will have more wear and tear since they are more active on their feet outdoors exploring on ther own two feet!

Moccasins seen here in the studz n babydollz shop are what is currently available. I add new styles , texture and colors often depending on availability some colors are limited supply so I may not have the same in a few weeks..

Some of our Moccasins are being sold as READY TO SHIP while other items are MADE TO ORDER please allow 1 week to ship. All of my shoes come in an organic gift bag.

FOLLOW us on Instagram  _studznbabydollz

name: Golden Bow Bubbles
description:
These fabulous moccs are totally exclusive! The Hot Pink leather moccasins are embellished with a bow made out of gold metallic leather gives it a girly finish. The back has a short pink leather fringe along the rest of the ankle's perimeter  *Limited edition.

All of our moccasins are made of genuine soft leather, handcrafted and designed to fit snug around your little ones feet. They all have a comfortable soft sole. They have elastic around the ankle for a comfortable fit and to assure that they won't come off their kicking and crawling little feet. All of our moccasins are easy to put on and easy to take off. They are great for newborns, crawlers and also great for toddlers. 


Moccasin sizing info:

Studz n Babydollz moccasins fit true to size for the most accurate fit measure your child's foot from the heel to the tip of the big toe and add 1/4-1/2" for wiggle room. The following chart is just an ESTIMATE of how these moccasins compare to shoe sizes. All feet are different, the size chart is a general guideline.

MADE TO ORDER SIZES:
4" finished sole (approximate US size 1 ) 0-3 mos.
4.5” finished sole (approximate US size 2 ) 3-6 mos.
5” finished sole (approximate US size 3/4) 6-12mos.
5.5” finished sole (approximate US size 5/6) 12-18 mos.
6" finished sole (approximate US size 6/7) 18-24 mos.

(Size 5.5" and larger will have a thicker suede sole. They can be worn outside for toddlers, but they will have more wear and tear since they are more active on their feet.

Moccasins seen here in the Studz n Babydollz shop are what is currently available. I add new styles, texture and colors often depending on availability. (Some colors are limited supply, so I may not have certain colors in stock.)

Some of our Moccasins are being sold as READY TO SHIP while other items are MADE TO ORDER please allow 1 week to ship. All of our shoes come in an organic gift bag.

name: Too Sassy Livin' Classy
description:
These fabulous moccs are totally exclusive! The front top of these pink leather moccasins are made out of distressed metallic leather with a silver and gold finish. The front top has a short pink leather fringe as well. Along the rest of the ankle's perimeter the distressed metallic leather with a silver and gold finish gives the mocc's a spunky yet edgy look! *Limited edition.

Some of our Moccasins are being sold as READY TO SHIP while other items are MADE TO ORDER please allow 1 week to ship. All of our shoes come in an organic gift bag.

name: Green Leaf
description:
This playful color is perfect for Fall. As you can see, the fringe has a unique shaped front alignment that gives a fun look to this individual pair!

All of our moccasins are made of genuine soft leather, handcrafted and designed to fit snug around your little ones feet. They all have a comfortable soft sole. They have elastic around the ankle for a comfortable fit and to assure that they won't come off their kicking and crawling little feet. All of our moccasins are easy to put on and easy to take off. They are great for newborns, crawlers and also great for toddlers. 


Moccasin sizing info:

Studz n Babydollz moccasins fit true to size for the most accurate fit measure your child's foot from the heel to the tip of the big toe and add 1/4-1/2" for wiggle room. The following chart is just an ESTIMATE of how these moccasins compare to shoe sizes. All feet are different, the size chart is a general guideline.
READY TO SHIP SIZE: 5.5",  US 5/6
MADE TO ORDER SIZES:
4" finished sole (approximate US size 1 ) 0-3 mos.
4.5” finished sole (approximate US size 2 ) 3-6 mos.
5” finished sole (approximate US size 3/4) 6-12mos.
5.5” finished sole (approximate US size 5/6) 12-18 mos.
6" finished sole (approximate US size 6/7) 18-24 mos.

(Size 5.5" and larger will have a thicker suede sole. They can be worn outside for toddlers, but they will have more wear and tear since they are more active on their feet.

Moccasins seen here in the Studz n Babydollz shop are what is currently available. I add new styles, texture and colors often depending on availability. (Some colors are limited supply, so I may not have certain colors in stock.)

Some of our Moccasins are being sold as READY TO SHIP while other items are MADE TO ORDER please allow 1 week to ship. All of our shoes come in an organic gift bag.
